mapper.select: SELECT hb.*, hm.id as hm_id, hm.hitter_id as hm_hitter_id, hm.game as hm_game, hm.appearance as hm_apperance, hm.at_bat as hm_at_bat, hm.hit as hm_hit, hm.hr as hm_hr, hm.scored as hm_scored, hm.rbi as hm_rbi, hm.bb as hm_bb, hm.strikesouts as hm_strikesouts, hm.stolen_base as hm_stolen_base, hm.batting_avg as hm_batting_avg, hm.obp as hm_obp, hm.slg as hm_slg, hm.ops as hm_ops, hm.war as hm_war FROM hitter_basic_record hb JOIN hitter_main_record hm on hb.hitter_main_record_id = hm.id

SELECT hb.*, hm.id as hm_id, hm.hitter_id as hm_hitter_id, hm.game as hm_game, hm.appearance as hm_apperance, hm.at_bat as hm_at_bat, hm.hit as hm_hit, hm.hr as hm_hr, hm.scored as hm_scored, hm.rbi as hm_rbi, hm.bb as hm_bb, hm.strikesouts as hm_strikesouts, hm.stolen_base as hm_stolen_base, hm.batting_avg as hm_batting_avg, hm.obp as hm_obp, hm.slg as hm_slg, hm.ops as hm_ops, hm.war as hm_war FROM hitter_basic_record hb JOIN hitter_main_record hm on hb.hitter_main_record_id = hm.id WHERE hb.id = #{hbno}
